website_summaries.verdict: While a little weak sole-wise, this is largely a sound boot across the board, and you can't beat the price.
pros: Comes in Peanut or Prairie Sand colors
cons: This option has pretty high arches and tends to run a little on the small side
The sole is not as durable as other models

customer_reviews.title: Superb product and value.
customer_reviews.text: I am truly blown away by these boots. Super comfortable, very good quality, and great looking. I'm amazed at how great the soles are. They provide excellent cushion and are very, very quiet. I feel like a ninja walking around with these boots, they make no sound. Stitching accents are quality and set the boot apart, impressing a much more expensive boot. Pictures dont do the leather justice on these. Amazing value, I will buy another pair of Ariat boots.
customer_reviews.author: RDubya73

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boot but, I prefer my Blundstones
customer_reviews.text: I've owned SEVERAL pairs of pull on boots like this particular pair in several different brands. I always come back to Blundstone. The Blundys are a bit more expensive but, I think they're a more comfortable, better fitting boot. The Ariat wasn't bad - not by any stretch. It seemed well-built and sturdy - it was a bit stiff out of the box like most boots. The materials seemed solid and durable. For me though, I ended up sending them back and ordered another pair of Blundstone 140's.
customer_reviews.author: Rockpick

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these for Christmas as a work boot instead of the usual Romeo boots he's worn for years. He absolutely loved these and wants to get a more casual Ariat boot as well for non-work related wear. He is very happy with them!!
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Great fit right out of the box....
customer_reviews.text: These are my first slip on ankle high boots, and they feel wonderful out of the box. Had I tried them on in a store, I'd have walked out in them. I was worried about fit, ease to put on and off, etc., but I couldn't be more impressed. They look great, appear to be high quality materials, and again, out of the box they fit me great, were easy to put on - the reason we all buy them, right? - and the arch support is super.
customer_reviews.author: WMF

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Quality, and Fit
customer_reviews.text: This pair of Ariat Spot Hog boots are exactly the same great quality and the same high level of comfort I have come to expect from Ariat. They fit, they are comfortable, and they are properly sturdy, right out of the box, with no need for a break-in period. If you are debating between there boots and something similar, I believe you should be pleased with your choice of these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Angel

customer_reviews.title: Mine were not made correctly
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 11.5W, but ordered a 12 rto be on the safe side. The collars were so tight that I could not even slip my feet into them without a shoehorn and a lot of effort. Once I had them on, I found the vamp very tight across the top of my feet. I would have preferred to get a replacement, but was concerned that they wouldn't fit either. To their credit, the seller handled the return cleanly and without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: orion1113

customer_reviews.title: Almost but not quite
customer_reviews.text: I am 6-4, 200lbs, normal width, size 12. My pinky toe on my right foot was being squished. Boots seemed to be high quality, and when walking, they felt comfortable on the bottom of my heel. Excellent flexibility. They were rubbing constantly on the sides of my heel so I returned them. I wanted to like them but just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: seems well made but not fitting me well
customer_reviews.text: seems well made but not fitting me well. the collar of the boot digs into my lower legs. could not wait to get them off. after reading so many rave reviews I'm just not seeing it. did not seem very comfortable in general. returned.
customer_reviews.author: brooks

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's hands down FAVORITE work boot
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY work boots that the hubby will wear now. And he's very picky. The ONLY negative is that the heel/sole wear down suddenly and quickly. Kinda out-of-nowhere, after a year or so of very regular use. But buying a new pair solves the problem. 2nd purchase. There will be a 3rd.
customer_reviews.author: GertyGirl

customer_reviews.title: I like the boots.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these many times before. Wore them completely out every time. This pair has taken me a bit longer to wear in , especially on my heels. Once these boots are worn in, they feel like moccasins. I find the sole material is a bit softer than other boots like these. They'll be the first to wear out, second will be the elastic on the sides. A bit more expensive than other boots I have that are comparable, I like knowing they're Ariats
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Great boot wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots but the color is no where near the color that’s in the picture!! NEEDS TO BE FIXED!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have previously owned two pair of these great boots. They were broken in and comfortable on day 1. This pair look similar but manufactured differently and with different materials. The foot hole is too small and the soles are lighter but very stiff. Not nearly as comfortable as before. Great expectations crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lane

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: The neck of the boot is tight, it's a little difficult to put on but the boot is very comfortable, light weight. Nice boot overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Ariat!!!
customer_reviews.text: What else would you expect from Ariat?!? Quality, durability and great looking boots... comfy as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: The legend

customer_reviews.title: I work in play in these boot over 12 hr day in and day out
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable boot right out of the box , I have been wearing this style of boot for over 20 yrs very durable needs little break in sizes are spot on
customer_reviews.author: clifton monhollen

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this type boot for 10 years, I order new ones every three years or so. Never have I had a problem with the fit of the boot. Just like new ones you have to break them in. I will keep buying them as long as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Magee

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday boot
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my 7th, maybe 8th pair of these boots. I love them as they so comfortable and easy to slip on. I must say I wear out a pair in 6-8 months. They are not falling apart worn out, but the tread is worn off the bottom and the sole is worn out. They are still my favorite everyday boot and I assume they wouldn’t be so comfortable if the sole was constructed out of something tougher. I’m an insurance adjuster and hobby farmer, so they walk around in body shops during the day and build fence and work in the shop at night.
customer_reviews.author: K. Coons

customer_reviews.title: You want a comfortable work boot, this is the ONE!
customer_reviews.text: The boot fits snugly and will need a little breaking in. It doesn’t slip up and down at the heel and has fully supportive footbed. And this boot is one of the most comfortable work boot I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.author: Slidelock One

customer_reviews.title: Fix the weak sole!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two pairs of these boots and loved them. I can't give them 5 stars due to the following: 1st pair the sole lasted 11 months 2nd pair the sole lasted 10 months I wore them almost everyday, however most of the time they were worn on office. I love the boots but wished they had a longer lasting sole. I'm ready for another pair, just not sure I will order these again.
customer_reviews.author: johnny portillo

customer_reviews.title: Aaaaah, relief
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet for 8 hours and walk an average of 6 miles each day. My heels were KILLING me even in running shoes. These boots solved that and have been a life saver. So comfortable and cushioning. Typical Ariat quality... excellent. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best boots for lawn care!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought five different brands of boots before these. They all wore out or or fell apart. I own a landscaping business in South Florida and conditions are brutal. The boots are not waterproof but they are pretty resistant to soggy ground. It took a couple of days for them to break in because the leather is thick and very durable. no laces means the grass doesn't stick to them at all. Other than slight discoloration from grass stains they are as good as new and I have used them every day this summer. The BEST!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size if you want them to fit.
customer_reviews.text: I am a traditional 10.5 in men’s. With these boots I would suggest going up. They are tight, I mean, uncomfortably tight if you buy your usual size. They are nice looking boots, just wish they fit and I could actually wear them. Hoping one day I lose my feet so I can’t get prosthetic that’s will fit the shelf hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Evan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Work boots
customer_reviews.text: I work in the wine industry where these boots are always exposed to water, caustic and acidic solutions, and grape juice. I gave them a waterproofing with Kiwi spray when I first got them, cleaned them and waxed them with Hubbards shoe grease every 6 months or so, and they have kept my feet safe and dry with minimal damage to the leather. Still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband and he loves them.. He did get bad blisters on his heel the first couple times he wore them but now that they are broke in they are very comfortable and his favorite boots. This is his second pair and his first pair did not leave the blisters so maybe it was just something that happened. Will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, except for a slight sizing issue.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size 14 and it fits like a 13. The build and material quality seems wonderful. If there was a size 15 option available, I would have just exchanged them. Kind of a bummer to return. Other than how tight they were they seemed like they would be comfortable and the quality is spot on. I highly recommend if you can purchase a size up from your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They actually arrived a day earlier than they were supposed to. So that was great! They fit just as expected! If ordering these get the exact size you wear. You will be pleased! They do have really good cushion in the insole! Would definitely recommend these to others!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable right from the start
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right from the start. Been wearing them everyday for two weeks and they fit and feel great. Fit was very good . Nice looking boots
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Webb.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot!!
customer_reviews.text: Ariat boots are amazing!! They are the most comfortable boot I have ever worn and totally worth the money. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: phyre6822

customer_reviews.title: Ariat last of good quality comfortable footwear
customer_reviews.text: as most of the reviews say, order a 1/2 size larger than your normal size. So comfortable. great quality.
customer_reviews.author: soopersale

customer_reviews.title: I really like them and they are pretty comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really like them and they are pretty comfy. Slightly small, I have been told by friends that ariat tend to stretch with wear so I hope they will be perfect. Still I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots but run too small
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 9.5 and I ordered these boots in 9.5. Boots arrived today but I can't even get my foot in them. They are being sent back. I should have read reviews before ordering these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Montina

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. The one caveat is that I have pretty high arches and if I wear thick (woolly) socks, the top of my foot starts to hurt after about 1/2 an hour.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great run around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, one of the straps broke first time I put them on, otherwise would have got 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KL BLAKE

customer_reviews.title: There is a problem with the size of this shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a problem with the size of this shoe. I usually wear 8-8.5 shoes. If I want to buy this shoe, I have to increase it by 1-1.5 or even 2 to wear it. Later retired. Wasting shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Zhi Ren Chen

customer_reviews.title: these things are awesome. Feels broken in very quick
customer_reviews.text: Had to get the 11.5 even though I'm a 12 in every other shoe I own. Aside from the fitting, these things are awesome. Feels broken in very quick. I went on a short hike to break em in and they felt great immediately and didn't give me blisters or soreness. Look and feel very quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best Boot!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these twice for my husband and he LOVES them! He wore the first pair everyday for three years and they held up well and have remained very comfortable. We just purchased his second pair and they are still the great quality that he enjoyed the first time around.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sealy

customer_reviews.title: Best work boots I've had in a long time
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable I purchased 4 pair. Two for work two for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Balderdash72

customer_reviews.title: Quality worth paying for!
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law wears these a lot. I wanted some to keep my feet dry during winter. Should be good, just need to spray them with leather protector! Fit really well!
customer_reviews.author: Judy K Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Love the fit. Love the pull tags in the front and back. Love that its a slip on boot not too high above the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Break in a day and they'll be great
customer_reviews.text: Husband says they are comfortable and he is on his feet at a shop for 10 hours. He said they did take a day or two to break in but are great now.
customer_reviews.author: TheWife

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of these boots. They are comfortable and work for any occasion. I always apply waterproofing wax to keep them nice and it darkens up the tone a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and very comfortable. I bought A half size bigger and the fit perfectly. I am a contractor in California and wear shorts almost year round, and the boots are perfect size and look with shorts. Great for going in customers homes for easy slip off at the door. Oil them and they last longer!
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my husbands second pair, he wears them every day and loves the ankle and arch support
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Man, these boots are tight!
customer_reviews.text: This my 3rd pair of Ariat boots. So, yes, I feel Ariat signifies a quality product. These boots are snug. With continual & dedicated wear, they will loosen up and give a formed fit. If you want something loose out of the box, order up.
customer_reviews.author: B. W. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: almost great
customer_reviews.text: these are extremely tight, especially if you have a high arch. too painful, even with thin socks. so I removed the insole, and they are fine. I hope they will loosen up in a couple weeks enough to put the insole back in. Otherwise, i love these.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer infrequent reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The worst material I’ve ever seen do not recommend after five ...
customer_reviews.text: The worst material I’ve ever seen do not recommend after five days of wearing they tore doesn’t even look like leather it looks like card board junk junk junk DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: ITGTONY

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. First pair lasted 3 years wearing 5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: smj316

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots which explains why this is my 8th pair in 16 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Like Em!
customer_reviews.text: The older I get the more I appreciate slip-on shoes. These are comfortable, well made, nice looking, and built to last. I like em. True to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots...stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are some really nice boots. I expected them to be nice, but I was amazed at how well they felt when I put them on. They are so nice!! They look awesome with everything. Definitely will wear these all winter.
customer_reviews.author: S-Mart

customer_reviews.title: Great looking ankle boots
customer_reviews.text: These look sharp with jeans (Fit a bit snug, will probably stretch)
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Pinckard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these for work. He wears through about a pair a year.
customer_reviews.author: Little Otter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best slip on Romeos I have tried. Good arch support. Much bettor than Georgia boots.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the boots, just to hard to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boot, but WAY too small!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the boots, but they were WAY too small. I wear a 13 and couldn't even come close to getting my foot in it! If I were to guess, I would say it was a size 11 they sent marked as a 13!
customer_reviews.author: DivisionBell81

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet, up it a half size.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return and get a half size bigger. Length was ok, but to narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wooley

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality real leather not cheap garbage like most leather out there. Thick but light sole and have lasted and held up to some abuse. Will purchase again in several years when these die.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hinz

customer_reviews.title: Good Ariat quality
customer_reviews.text: Good for paddock boots, as this is what I bought them for anyway. Usual Ariat quality, would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for casual wear, true to size for those with large feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a casual Chelsea-style boot. A+ fit, probably the most comfortable boot I’ve worn. I wear a size 14 and have a wide toe box and they fit true to size. I immediately oiled them up and they turned to a very nice light brown.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Orr

customer_reviews.title: I like them and will order Ariat again
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing them for about a month now. I like them and will order Ariat again. My only issue with these is the sole tread is large so it picks up rocks easily. This doesn't bother me enough to complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They hold up well & are true to size.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair I have ordered for my husband. This is now his “dress up” pair. His other 2 pairs he uses to mow, clean the barn etc. he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The boots look great and can be polished up well to return the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ariat shoes always fit me so I knew what to expect. The boots look great and can be polished up well to return the luster tot he leather.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort !
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. First pair worn completely out,because I literally wear them every day until I’m ready for bed. Most comfortable shoe/boot I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: clark carter

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Not sure what to think yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: These boots are made for wherever you want to go.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with these boots. They must be made in America 🇺🇸. Because they feel just right.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Beasley

customer_reviews.title: It Fits Snug
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots a few weeks ago and they're holding up great! I'm a women that likes to wear men's boots when I'm welding. I usually am a 9.5 in women's so I ordered a 7.5. They fit very well. I really love how I can just slip them on and run out the door. Overall, this is a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: I've got a blister
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the boots, but the left boot has rubbed my ankle to the point I have to wear a bandaid as it is sore and open. I'm hoping it works through this painful stage soon or I will have misspent $114.
customer_reviews.author: Michael OCain

customer_reviews.title: How maeny sizes of 11.5  wide dose AIRAT BOOT COMPANY OFFER ?
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ! Well made ! I have had a pair of ARAIT boots for two years. Size 11.5 W. Great boots. I purchased two different ARAIT boots size 11.5 W . I could not get a foot in either pair
customer_reviews.author: James A. May

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot. Fit is good. Very comfortable. Just wish it only had one pull tab on the back of it instead of the two it has. Otherwise great boot
customer_reviews.author: Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fit as expected. Soft and comfortable once you break them in. A well made boot. The toes are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Ros63

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Had these stretched professionally and they have now become my everything boot
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L Moore

customer_reviews.title: They're worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I buy these boots for my son, and he loves them! This is honestly the only shoe he wears! They last a long time, and and look great (weather casual or for dress)! I would highly recommend this product to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Great pull on boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Very comfortable and no break in period like all Ariat boots. I can wear them work pants, khakis or jeans, they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Took alittle while for them to arrive but been happy with the boots so far, comfortable, notice they are lighter than my Georgia romeos. See if they last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was too narrow for my feet, so I sent them back. Other wise, the boot is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and short breakin period
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the boots. They are well built and are relatively easy to breakin.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Beck

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boots I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. Most comfortable boots I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: onemanwolfpack

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful boots. My son requires a size 14
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful boots. My son requires a size 14, and these fit beautifully. They are very well made, and look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: 3boydragons

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever! I have had two pair over the years. Last pair lasted about 8 years. I retired them to yard work and bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: kwcbones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many pair. I’m a farmer and wear them every day for work and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting and looking boots, break in time is hours
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This boot is sharp looking for both work & casual wear. Is also lightweight , my normal12 was a bit snug
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Pinckard

customer_reviews.title: Good casual boot
customer_reviews.text: Good looking light weight boots..not really for "heavy" work but very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mark Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: husband wears them to work and they are super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Swift

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair I've purchased. Great for slipping on and off and not too hot for warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Larson

customer_reviews.title: Work or Casual
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. True sized shoes. So if you where a 12.5, order a 12. I could see using these as work shoes as they fit tight, but are very comfortable. I have a desk job and do some walking, so work also as a casual shoe/boot as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Reid

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly true to size . I wear a 9-1/2 and this 9-1/2 should have been a 10
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice shoes but too small in my usual size. had to send them back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots for an excellent price. These boots look just as good in the office as they do on the trail. Ariat doesn't seem to be sacrificing quality like so many other brands. A little snug at first but they loosen up. A tad on the long side.
customer_reviews.author: Chipmunk

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot, slip on with great support!
customer_reviews.text: Best all-around boot for dress, pleasure and work. I own several pair & rotate. Excellent quality & comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot, but fits a lot smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Hubby likes these boots. The most comfortable he has ever had! He has been buying for the last 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Duke

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They fit good and seem very durable. I coated them with mink oil and they darkened down a little bit to a light brown. I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY A. CROSS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, first pair of these I wore out (3 yrs) I sure hope they keep making them !
customer_reviews.author: Lars Alles

customer_reviews.title: but after a few days they fit like a
customer_reviews.text: Boots are tight at first, but after a few days they fit like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! They fit exactly the way they are sized. Excellent support and very comfortable. I will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the material, sole (slick on some surfaces), just a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: john brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT IS A GOOD PRODUCT, IT IS VERY SATISFIED WITH IT, AND I AM VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.author: hector castrezana ruiz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The reviews stated the size fit, but I ordered two separate pairs and they fit very small.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Latka

customer_reviews.title: ariat spot hog boots
customer_reviews.text: these are the best for my feet. i just wish i could get factory insoles in five to six months when i kill the origenals. i feel the insoles are what make these so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ariat Men's Spot Hog Western Cowboy Boot
product_meta.description: Works boots to fit all needs
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately ankle-high from arch
Pull on silhouette w/ side stretch elastic panels
